recipesJson.name: Apple Cake
recipesJson.author: Foment_life
recipesJson.description:
it's just flat out tasty. Like a cake made with apple sauce and a good bit of cinnamon. 

Because of the Cake batter, this is not recommended until a week has passed.

reviews.text: This recipe is incredibly refreshing. It vaguely reminds me of the filling in an apple strudel then the cake pops in and just completes the experience.
